"Xiera":
"<%me>, Xiera here!
I've been analyzing that Stratos that appeared in the Shop Area from here."
"According to my analysis, she's a Phantom. A harmless, non-hostile Phantom."
"As I'm sure you remember, Phantoms are creatures created when Ether reacts to someone's emotions."
"Since she's so focused on people enjoying Valentine's Day, it's likely that the real Stratos's feelings are what were embodied..."
"In any case, if we can deal with the Phantom's feelings, we should be able to resolve this situation. I'd appreciate your help with this!"
